This is some *ref.[^fn]

[^fn]: Some foot note text
{: .class}

> a blockquote [^3]

* and a list item [^1]

# And a header[^now]

[^1]:some *text*
[^3]: other text
    with more lines

    > and a quote

A marker without a definition [^without].

A marker [^empty] used twice[^fn] and thrice[^fn].

[^now]:

    	code block
        continued here

[^empty]:
